text.text_translated: For example, you might dream about a phone call. This call could be from an old friend. You might also dream that someone close dies. These dreams are more likely to happen by chance. They probably do not show what will happen in the future. Also, we often dream about these things. But we forget them when they do not happen.

feedback.feedback: The text is a perfect example of B1 writing. Sentences are short and clear. Vocabulary is simple and appropriate. The original meaning is preserved without error.
